name: Koi Fish Hat
description:
## Koi Fish Hat

A hat inspired by the graceful and colorful koi fish, adding an elegant touch to your outfit.

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
